p: The results of the effect of S. officinalis, L. citriodora, M. piperita essential oils and coniferous and M. chamomilla extracts on oral bacteria showed that S. officinalis, L. citriodora, M. piperita essential oils were able to remove the biofilms created by these bacteria. However, coniferous and chamomile extracts were unable to counteract with the biofilm formed by these bacteria. Peppermint essential oil showed the highest ability to remove biofilm created by oral bacteria.
